thread.title: 'Multi-million euro scam' allowing immigrants to set up 'fake lives' in Ireland
thread.title_full: 'Multi-million euro scam' allowing immigrants to set up 'fake lives' in Ireland

title: 'Multi-million euro scam' allowing immigrants to set up 'fake lives' in Ireland
text: 'Multi-million euro scam' allowing immigrants to set up 'fake lives' in Ireland Independent.ie Thousands of people are using a scam to secure residency for non-EU family members in the UK by creating false "lives" in Ireland, it has been reported. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/multimillion-euro-scam-allowing-immigrants-to-set-up-fake-lives-in-ireland-35373491.html http://www.independent.ie/world-news/europe/britain/article35360783.ece/deae3/AUTOCROP/h342/PANews_P-a2a5591b-f34a-4f63-83e0-e55ed6412bfa_I1.jpg UK Immigration Minister Robert Goodwill Thousands of people are using a scam to secure residency for non-EU family members in the UK by creating false "lives" in Ireland, it has been reported. Share 'Multi-million euro scam' allowing immigrants to set up 'fake lives' in Ireland Independent.ie Thousands of people are using a scam to secure residency for non-EU family members in the UK by creating false "lives" in Ireland, it has been reported. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/multimillion-euro-scam-allowing-immigrants-to-set-up-fake-lives-in-ireland-35373491.html
